archimate:BusinessRole.name: Auditor Accreditor
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: An Organization authorized by a Governance Authority to issue Auditor Credentials under a particular Governance Framework. Auditor Accreditation involves assessing the competence and qualifications of Auditors accepted within the relevant jurisdiction against generally accepted audit standards. See Appendix H.
